name: Rightboat
tag_list: boats-for-sale, yachts-for-sale, power-boats, sailing-boats, crusiers, fishing-boats, house-boats, ribs, speed--boats
description: The fastest way to search boats for sale
overview:
Find boats for sale from around the world.

Rightboat.com was formed by a couple of friends to revolutionise the boats-for-sale market.

The site allows private and companies to advertise boats with detailed descriptions and unlimited photos.

Since it’s launch they have been active campaigners for cleaner, higher quality boat listings. The site was the first to tackle the problem with ghost boat listings which hurt both the marine industry and the consumer.

The site was has had many technical firsts for it’s industry including search suggest, faceted search, ajax search results, free boat valuations.

The site has gone through many versions with a complete rebuild during 2012.
